alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Hudspeth (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued June 16 at 12:52AM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY. THIS IS A CHILD ABDUCTION ALERT ISSUED BY THE TEXAS AMBER ALERT NETWORK THE HONEY GROVE POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR KIONNA BRAXTON, BLACK, FEMALE, 13 YEARS OLD, 4 FEET 11 INCHES, 200 POUNDS, BROWN EYES, BLACK HAIR. LAST SEEN WEARING BLONDISH/BROWN BRAIDS, ORANGE AND WHITE CHEERLEADING OUTFIT, AND BLUE/ORANGE/RED CROC FOOTWEAR. LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THIS CHILD TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE HONEY GROVE POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 9 0 3 - 3 7 8 - 2 2 2 2. NEWS MEDIA POINT OF CONTACT IS HONEY GROVE POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 9 0 3 - 3 7 8 - 2 2 2 2.
